I only read the 1st story so:
Liked parts: 1. The husband didn't just despaired and took it lying down. When he founded out he cheated on him and the child isn't even his he stabbed him in the kidneys, killed his wife (+ for brutality & lack  of hesitation because he obviously has no blood ties with the child and considers it so) and just Fucking hanged himself because of guilt and not making any excuses.
2. The bad guy carried the child with him when he seemed help showing that he kinda cared? He still lied to her, messed with her common sense, failed in her proper upbringing and fucked her though so that was kinda negated to the negatives.
Disliked parts: 1. She did not discuss with him.
2. Her resistance is pitifully shitty at best.
3. He should've properly asked her what's wrong and properly consoled her.
4. It's standard ntr scenario  but just with a deliciously ( for me ) bad (brilliantly good) end .
